Package org.odpi.openmetadata.commonservices.mermaid

Class MermaidGraphBuilderBase

java.lang.Object
org.odpi.openmetadata.commonservices.mermaid.MermaidGraphBuilderBase
Direct Known Subclasses:
AssetGraphMermaidGraphBuilder, AssetISCGraphMermaidGraphBuilder, AssetLineageEdgeGraphMermaidGraphBuilder, AssetLineageGraphMermaidGraphBuilder, DataClassMermaidGraphBuilder, DataFieldMermaidGraphBuilder, DataStructureMermaidGraphBuilder, FieldLevelLineageMermaidGraphBuilder, GlossaryCategoryMermaidGraphBuilder, GlossaryMermaidGraphBuilder, GlossaryTermMermaidGraphBuilder, GovernanceActionProcessMermaidGraphBuilder, GovernanceDefinitionMermaidGraphBuilder, HierarchyMermaidGraphBuilder, InformationSupplyChainMermaidGraphBuilder, OpenMetadataMermaidGraphBuilder, ProjectMermaidGraphBuilder, SolutionBlueprintMermaidGraphBuilder, SolutionComponentMermaidGraphBuilder, SolutionRoleMermaidGraphBuilder, SpecificationMermaidGraphBuilder
public class MermaidGraphBuilderBase extends Object
Provides the basic functions for building flowchart based graph visualizations.

    • extractAnchorInfo

      Extract any anchor information to allow the graph to include linkages to anchors. This can help join up lineage graphs.
      Parameters:
      elementHeader - header of extracted element

    • appendNewMermaidNode

      public boolean appendNewMermaidNode(String currentNodeName, String currentDisplayName, String currentType, VisualStyle visualStyle)
      Create a node in the mermaid graph.
      Parameters:
      currentNodeName - unique name/identifier
      currentDisplayName - display name
      currentType - type of element
      visualStyle - mermaid defined shape and colour value
      Returns:
      whether a new node was created or not.

    • appendNewMermaidNode

      public boolean appendNewMermaidNode(String currentNodeName, String currentDisplayName, String currentType, Map<String,String> additionalProperties, VisualStyle visualStyle)
      Create a node in the mermaid graph.
      Parameters:
      currentNodeName - unique name/identifier
      currentDisplayName - display name
      currentType - type of element
      additionalProperties - additional properties to add to the node
      visualStyle - mermaid defined shape and colour value
      Returns:
      whether a new node was created or not.

      public void appendMermaidThinLine(String lineName, String end1Id, String label, String end2Id)
      Append a new single pixel width line to the graph.
      Parameters:
      lineName - unique identifier of the line - may be null
      end1Id - identifier of the starting end
      label - label for the line
      end2Id - identifier of the ending end

    • addDataFieldToGraph

      protected void addDataFieldToGraph(DataFieldElement dataFieldElement)
      Add a data field to graph. If it has sub-fields, they are recursively added.
      Parameters:
      dataFieldElement - element to process

    • addMemberDataFieldToGraph

      protected void addMemberDataFieldToGraph(String parentNodeName, MemberDataField memberDataField)
      Add a nested data field to graph. If it has sub-fields, they are recursively added.
      Parameters:
      parentNodeName - identifier of the parent node (maybe null)
      memberDataField - element to process

    • addRelatedToElementSummaries

      public void addRelatedToElementSummaries(List<RelatedMetadataElementSummary> relatedMetadataElements, VisualStyle visualStyle, String startingEndId)
      Link the list of related elements into the graph.
      Parameters:
      relatedMetadataElements - list of related element (if null, nothing is added to the graph)
      visualStyle - visual style for new nodes
      startingEndId - identity of the starting node

    • addRelatedToElementSummary

      public void addRelatedToElementSummary(RelatedMetadataElementSummary relatedMetadataElement, VisualStyle visualStyle, String end1Id)
      Link the related element into the graph.
      Parameters:
      relatedMetadataElement - related element (if null, nothing is added to the graph)
      visualStyle - visual style for new nodes
      end1Id - identity of the starting node

    • addRelatedFromElementSummaries

      public void addRelatedFromElementSummaries(List<RelatedMetadataElementSummary> relatedMetadataElements, VisualStyle visualStyle, String startingEndId)
      Link the list of related elements into the graph.
      Parameters:
      relatedMetadataElements - list of related element (if null, nothing is added to the graph)
      visualStyle - visual style for new nodes
      startingEndId - identity of the starting node

    • addRelatedFromElementSummary

      public void addRelatedFromElementSummary(RelatedMetadataElementSummary relatedMetadataElement, VisualStyle visualStyle, String end2Id)
      Link the related element into the graph.
      Parameters:
      relatedMetadataElement - related element (if null, nothing is added to the graph)
      visualStyle - visual style for new nodes
      end2Id - identity of the starting node

    • getCardinalityLabel

      protected String getCardinalityLabel(String positionString, String minCardinalityString, String maxCardinalityString)
      Take the string versions of the position, minCardinality and maxCardinality and turn them into a label. If none of these properties are set then null is returned.
      Parameters:
      positionString - string value of the position attribute
      minCardinalityString - string value of the minCardinality attribute
      maxCardinalityString - string value of the maxCardinality attribute
      Returns:
      label or null

    • getCardinalityLabel

      protected String getCardinalityLabel(int position, int minCardinality, int maxCardinality)
      Take the position, minCardinality and maxCardinality attributes and turn them into a label.
      Parameters:
      position - position attribute
      minCardinality - minCardinality attribute
      maxCardinality - maxCardinality attribute
      Returns:
      label

    • addSolutionComponentToGraph

      protected void addSolutionComponentToGraph(String parentNodeName, String parentLinkLabel, SolutionComponentElement solutionComponentElement, List<String> solutionLinkingWireGUIDs, boolean fullDisplay)
      Add a solution component to graph.
      Parameters:
      parentNodeName - identifier of the parent node (maybe null)
      parentLinkLabel - add label to parent link - also optional
      solutionComponentElement - element to process
      solutionLinkingWireGUIDs - list of solution wires already defined
      fullDisplay - print all elements

    • addStyles

      protected void addStyles(Map<String,VisualStyle> nodeColours)
      Add styling for nodes as requested. These go at the end of the graph.

    • clearGraph

      protected void clearGraph()
      Clear the graph

      public String getMermaidGraph(boolean allAnchors)
      Add anchors, any style requests and return the built mermaid graph.
      Parameters:
      allAnchors - should all anchors be added - or just those to known nodes?
      Returns:
      string markdown

      public String getMermaidGraph()
      Add any style requests and return the built mermaid graph.
      Returns:
